title: Chest Rewards

replies.body: Which champ was it for?  You won't get a chest if you've already gotten one with them this season per the [hextech crafting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) guide.  You'll need to also own the champion.  Let me know if that clears things up!
Oh I don't own the champion!! must be that!! aaah i feel stupid! I ll check the guide! thanks ! appreciate it! {{summoner:4}}
